name: Crazy Soccer: Football Stars
description: The Interstellar Soccer Cup is here! Use mines, cows and flying saucers in the most unrealistic football-manager ever and lead your team to victory. Play against AI opponents, friends and random opponents online!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 2000 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4600 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 900 MB available space
